Bash(git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Release v1.0.0 - Commission System & Sales Analytics

This is the first stable release of the Banca Management Backend, marking the completion of the MVP with the addition of a comprehensive commission system.

🎯 Highlights

✅ Hierarchical commission system with JSON policies
✅ Immutable commission snapshots per bet (jugada)
✅ 6 new CRUD endpoints for policy management
✅ Extended sales analytics with commission metrics
✅ Complete documentation and migration guide
✅ Zero-downtime error handling

📦 New Features

Commission System:
- JSON-based commission policies (version 1)
- Hierarchical resolution: USER → VENTANA → BANCA
- First-match-wins rule evaluation
- Support for lotería, betType, and multiplier range filters
- Temporal validity (effectiveFrom/effectiveTo)
- Auto-UUID generation for rules

Database Schema:
- commissionPolicyJson in Banca, Ventana, User (JSONB)
- commissionPercent, commissionAmount, commissionOrigin, commissionRuleId in Jugada

API Endpoints:
- PUT/GET /api/v1/bancas/:id/commission-policy
- PUT/GET /api/v1/ventanas/:id/commission-policy
- PUT/GET /api/v1/users/:id/commission-policy

Sales Analytics Extensions:
- /api/v1/ventas/summary with commissionTotal & netoDespuesComision
- /api/v1/ventas/breakdown with commission metrics per dimension
- /api/v1/ventas/timeseries with commission data

📚 Documentation

- docs/COMMISSION_SYSTEM.md - Complete commission system guide
- README.md - Updated with commission section
- CHANGELOG.md - Detailed release notes

🔧 Migration

Run: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate

⚠️ Breaking Changes

None - This is a backwards-compatible addition.

🙏 Credits

Developed by Mario Quirós Pizarro (@MQuirosP)
With assistance from Claude Code
EOF
)")
